name: Chocolate Cake
desc: This is the easiest and yummiest Chocolate cake.  This is always a winner

normal: Heat oven to 180°C. Spray and Cook and line a oven tray (27X39cm tray) or 2 x 20cm round cake tins with baking paper
Sieve all the dry ingredients together in a big mixing bowel
Mix all the other ingredients (except the Icing ingredients) together in a mug and pour over the dry ingredients
Pour the liquid mixture over the dry ingredients and mix together with a fork or a wisk, till all ingredients are mixed in well
Bake for 20 minutes or till the skewer come out clean when testing
As soon as the cake is ready take it out of the oven and leave to cool down
While you wait for the cake to cool down you can make the Icing for the cake
Mix the butter/margarine till light and fluffy
Sieve the icing sugar and cocoa while mixing
Add the vanilla essence and mix well
When you are ready to ice the cake. Use the chocolate icing and finish the cake of with fresh strawberries

Variation:: To make chocolate cupcakes, preheat oven to 180°C and line 48 muffin pans with paper cases
Prepare cake batter according to the instructions for The Chocolate Cake (see above)
Spoon mixture into the paper cases, filling about two thirds full
Bake for 15-20 minutes. Cool before icing
For icing, Use the same as for the cake
Icing can be stored in the fridge in a sealed container for up to a week
Pipe onto the cakes and top with confectionery sprinkles. Makes 48.
